text: Polyacanthia fonscolombei is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Xavier Montrouzier in 1861.BioLib.cz - Polyacanthia fonscolombei. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Polyacanthia fonscolombei fonscolombei Montrouzier, 1861 * Polyacanthia fonscolombei hebridarum Breuning, 1950 ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1861
title: Polyacanthia fonscolombei
